channel.title: Comments on: Final Fantasy V – Platonic Love is Important Too
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Samantha Penn
item.dc:creator: Samantha Penn
item.description: Great article! FFV does not get nearly as much as love as it deserves. it's always overshadowed by 4 and 6 ? i liked the more whimsical vibe of 5 esp. since we didnt really see that again until 9. 4 and 6-8 were so heavy. Not everything needs romance!!! (also i love my pirate mom faris). The female representation in FF5 made me feel so special as a kid, when you could only really play as dudes back in the day.
item.content:encoded: Great article! FFV does not get nearly as much as love as it deserves. it’s always overshadowed by 4 and 6 ? i liked the more whimsical vibe of 5 esp. since we didnt really see that again until 9. 4 and 6-8 were so heavy. Not everything needs romance!!! (also i love my pirate mom faris). The female representation in FF5 made me feel so special as a kid, when you could only really play as dudes back in the day.
